data.title: Similar companies to Crytek
data.meta_description: Companies like Crytek. Similar companies and competitors in the areas of Game development, Developer, Computer and video games, Web and Mobile and more.
data.text:
Firebrand Games

n/a

Founded 2006

United Kingdom

Firebrand Games is an independent publisher and developer of video games and interactive entertainment with studios in Glasgow (Scotland) and Merritt Island (Florida).

http://www.firebrandgames.com/

Unity Technologies

Privately Held

Founded 2003

USA

Unity 3 is a game development tool that has been designed to let you focus on creating amazing games. Unity is the development environment that gets out of your way, allowing you to focus on simply creating your game. Developing for web, mobile, or console? Unity is the tool for the job.

http://unity3d.com

TRY OUR SIMILAR COMPANIES APP

Find B2B Sales Prospects

Research Competitive Landscapes

Export Lists

Open Now

Tag Games

Privately Held

Founded 2006

United Kingdom

Tag Games is one of the first mobile software development studios in the world to have developed proprietary technology which enables development of social mobile software for iOS and Android simultaneously (support for more mobile platforms incoming). Our ‘Mo’ technology further allows for truly multi/cross-platform social games and applications, world-leading in terms of practical quality and convenience. Mo technology – including a software-engine and total back-end user profiling infrastructure – militates the traditional opportunity cost for our customers of developing for one mobile platform by facilitating several concurrently, thus allowing entrance to multiple mobile market instantly without requiring a hedge platform.

http://www.tag-games.com/

Cyanide

Privately Held

Founded 2000

France

Cyanide is an independent and privately held French – Canadian video game development studio based in Paris. Created in 2000 it has become one of the most active and productive studios in the French video games industry. Cyanide positions itself to fully benefit from the evolutions of the video game market and the new opportunities brought about by the internet. Cyanide is best-known for its Pro Cycling Manager series of games and new titles like Blood Bowl. The studio working on new licences and will release new titles from the well-known licence « A Song of Ice and Fire ».

http://www.cyanide-studio.com/

Pieces Interactive AB

Privately Held

Founded 2007

Sweden

Pieces Interactive AB is a privately held game development studio located in Skövde, Sweden. We are one of the first studios to open doors in the game hub that is now known as Sweden Game Arena. Since 2006, we released over 10 games and DLCs on PC, PS3, Xbox 360, iOS and Android. If Puzzlegedon, Leviathan: Warships or Magicka are familiar names to you, you’ve probably experienced our work.

http://piecesinteractive.se/

Big Blue Bubble

Privately Held

Founded 2004

Canada

Big Blue Bubble, Inc. is an independent Canadian developer, and publisher of mobile video games headquartered in London, Ontario, Canada, with an office in San Francisco, California. The company is best known for the My Singing Monsters mobile game franchise.

http://www.bigbluebubble.com/

Bluepoint Games

Privately Held

Founded 2006

USA

Bluepoint Games, Inc. is an American independent video game developer located in Austin, Texas. Bluepoint Games Vice President Andy O'Neil previously served as technical lead engineer on Metroid Prime (2002) and Metroid Prime 2: Echoes (2004) titles for Nintendo of America Inc.

http://bluepointgames.com/

Destineer

Privately Held

Founded 2000

USA

Destineer was a computer game developer and publisher based in Minnesota, United States. It was founded in 2000 by former Bungie Studios vice-president, Peter Tamte. It released titles under a number of brands, including MacSoft, Bold Games and Atomic Games.

http://www.destineergames.com/

QUANTIC DREAM

Privately Held

Founded 1997

France

QUANTIC DREAM was founded in 1997 and it has gained over the years international recognition for its contribution to interactive narration and its fresh thinking on emotion in games. We are also considered one of the leading motion capture studios, in particular for the creation of real-time 3D Virtual Actors performing with stunning realism. Since our foundation we have developed proprietary technologies, including some very advanced tools and a unique approach to the production pipeline. As a game development studio, we collaborated in the past with major publishers including Eidos, Vivendi Universal Games, Microsoft Games Studios, Atari and Sony Computer Entertainment.

http://www.quanticdream.com/

Starbreeze

Publicly Traded

Founded 1998

Sweden

Starbreeze Studios is a video game development studio and publisher, based in Stockholm, Sweden. Notable games developed include The Chronicles of Riddick: Escape from Butcher Bay, Payday 2 and Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons.

http://starbreeze.com

tinyBuild GAMES

Privately Held

Founded 2011

USA

tinyBuild LLC, doing business as tinyBuild Games (stylized as tinyBuild GAMES, commonly referred to as tinyBuild), is an American video game publisher and video game developer that is primarily associated with the games No Time to Explain and SpeedRunners. Based in Bothell, Washington, with a development studio in Utrecht, Netherlands, the company was founded by Alex Nichiporchik, Luke Burtis and Tom Brien. Having found success with digital games No Time to Explain and SpeedRunners, the latter of which was developed by DoubleDutch Games, the company has since moved into video game publishing, and has helped third-party studios release numerous titles across PC, mobile and console.

http://tinybuild.com/

Supermassive Games

Privately Held

Founded 2008

United Kingdom

Supermassive Games is a British video game developer based in Guildford, Surrey, United Kingdom that are best known for their work on the 2015 interactive drama survival horror video game Until Dawn. The company specializes in development for the PlayStation family of systems, only producing one title that was not released for a Sony console, and two that were not exclusives.

http://www.supermassivegames.com/

comcept USA, LLC

n/a

Founded 2010

Japan

Comcept Inc. is a Japanese independent video game developer based in both Tokyo and Osaka. It was founded on December 1, 2010 by former Capcom employee Keiji Inafune. The name "Comcept is a combination of the words concept, and com, referring to the abbreviation of computer and a transparent reference to Capcom.

http://www.comcept.co.jp/en/

Digital Legends Entertainment

Privately Held

Founded 2001

Spain

Developer of innovative gaming concepts and breakthrough gaming 3D technologies for the mobile space. Digital Legends Entertainment (DLE) is Barcelona’s international award-winning games studio, that develops best-in-class games for mobile native and handheld platforms, powered by in-house cutting-edge technology. It was founded video industry veterans which were key members of the Severance/Blade the Edge of Darkness video game developed on PC. The studio team members have collectively released over 10 million units on current generation platforms. DLE video games are distinguished worldwide through the quality of in-house cutting-edge 3D and connectivity technologies, design expertise and game development processes. Examples of games developed by DLE are One (Nokia), Dance fabulous (Nokia) or Kroll (iphone).

http://www.digital-legends.com/

Bravo Interactive

n/a

Founded date unknown

Ukraine

Based in Kiev, Ukraine, Bravo Interactive is a production house focused on creation of top-quality graphical assets for computer and video games. Since 2002 Bravo has contributed to 35 original titles developed by renowned companies from all around the world.

http://www.bravointeractive.com

TRY OUR SIMILAR COMPANIES APP

Find B2B Sales Prospects

Research Competitive Landscapes

Export Lists

Open Now

Cathedral Studios

Privately Held

Founded 2021

USA

Cathedral Studios is a diverse team of developers with experience from renowned titles such as Far Cry, Borderlands, Assassin's Creed, Sea of Thieves, and Call of Duty. The studio's main focus is on crafting immersive stories and captivating gameplay experiences. Their latest project, The Bornless, is an indie horror game set in an enigmatic town where demonic entities and human realms collide, aiming to redefine the horror gaming genre with its narrative-driven, visually arresting, and thoroughly engaging horror experience.

https://www.cathedral-studios.com/

Jabali

Privately Held

Founded 2023

USA

Jabali is a collective of game developers, academics, researchers, and engineers focused on creating innovative video games and game developer tools. With a history of contributing to prominent projects and products in the tech and gaming industry, the team is dedicated to democratizing video game development. The company's expertise spans game programming education, competitive gaming, and the development of large-scale cloud services, with a deep understanding of the challenges faced by game developers.

https://www.jabali.ai

Agora Games

Privately Held

Founded 2005

USA

Agora Games is a video game development company that works with game developers to build online features and web-based communities for video games. It has worked with publishers such as Activision, Konami, RedOctane, and Nintendo, and with game studios such as Vicarious Visions, Neversoft, Splash Damage, id Software, Vicious Cycle Software, 1st Playable Productions, and Gas Powered Games. Major League Gaming acquired Agora Games on August 18, 2009.

http://www.agoragames.com

Lucid Games Limited

Privately Held

Founded 2011

United Kingdom

Established in February 2011 by senior developers from Bizarre Creations, Lucid has set itself out to be a small team with big ideas and the skills to deliver them.;Our performance over the past few years has proved we are just that. We've successfully won contracts to build dynamic new IP, settled ourselves into a shiny new office in the heart of Liverpool's creative quarter and completed a number of technically challenging work-for-hire contracts.

http://lucidgames.co.uk

Proper Games

n/a

Founded 2006

United Kingdom

Proper Games is one of the leading independent game development studios in the UK and registered as an official developer across all major home console and mobile gaming formats.

http://www.proper-games.com/

Trendy Entertainment

Privately Held

Founded 2009

USA

Trendy Entertainment is an independent video game development studio based in Gainesville, FL. Created by veterans of the video game industry, Trendy is focused on developing fun and innovative video games across multiple platforms. Trendy Entertainment is composed of a world class group of artists, designers, animators, and engineers. With well over 40 years of collective industry experience and talent from studios such as Bethesda & Epic Games, they create unique, fun and polished AAA digital titles for everyone to enjoy.

http://trendyent.com/

Playground Games

Privately Held

Founded 2010

United Kingdom

We've been making games for other people for over 20 years. In 2009 we set up Playground Games to make them for ourselves. Our vision was to build a development studio which could compete with the very best in the world, creating big budget console games for a global audience. We don’t intend to become the largest studio in the world, but we do intend to become the best. Our debut title, Forza Horizon, will be a huge step towards that goal.

http://www.playground-games.com/

Funcom

Publicly Traded

Founded 1993

Norway

World leading independent developer and publisher of MMO (Massively Multiplayer Online) games. Funcom has since 1993 developed and published over 25 game titles across several gaming platforms. Most notable of these are the MMOs 'Age of Conan' and 'Anarchy Online', as well as ‘Dreamfall’ and 'The Longest Journey'. New titles include ‘The Secret World’ and ‘Pets vs. Monsters’.

http://www.funcom.com/

Ninja Theory Ltd

Privately Held

Founded 2004

United Kingdom

Ninja Theory was formed in Cambridge in November 2004 by Nina Kristensen, Mike Ball, Tameem Antoniades and Jez San. Formerly known as Just Add Monsters Ltd it is the team behind the ground-breaking Heavenly Sword, critically acclaimed Enslaved: Odyssey to the West and the forthcoming Devil May Cry title DmC. Ninja Theory also created Kung Fu Chaos, an Xbox exclusive game published in 2003 by Microsoft Games Studios.Ninja Theory pioneered the use of performance capture in video games and was one of the first studios to commit exclusively to the next-generation consoles.

http://www.ninjatheory.com/
